text: Iligan's at-large congressional district is the congressional district of the Philippines in Iligan. It has been represented in the House of Representatives of the Philippines since 2010, and in the Batasang Pambansa in 1984 to 1986. Previously included in Lanao del Sur's 1st congressional district from 1987 to 2010, and in Lanao del Sur's at-large congressional district prior to 1984, it includes all barangays of the city.
